scheduler

Class Scheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • scheduler.Scheduler

  • public class Scheduler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class manage all of our application work. It takes required data input from user and store it in appointment object and then save it in array list of appointments.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Surjeet Singh

      • makeAppointmentFromUserInput

        public Appointment makeAppointmentFromUserInput()
        Method takes appointment data i.e full name, phone number, calendar(date and time), activity for appointment, from user
        Returns:
        Appointment object contains data based on user input

      • makeCalendarFromUserInput

        public static java.util.Calendar makeCalendarFromUserInput(boolean suppressHour,
                                                           java.lang.String date,
                                                           java.lang.String time)
        Take date and time input from user and validate Date and Time to meet mentioned format(DDMMYYYY)
        Parameters:
        suppressHour - boolean representing suppressHour
        date - String contains date input from user
        time - String contains time input from user
        Returns:
        Calendar object based on user input
        Throws:
        If - date does not meet required format then throws BadAppointmentData exception

      • saveAppointment

        public boolean saveAppointment(Appointment apt)
        Method used to add new appointment(if it does no already exist) in array list of appointments and then sort it
        Parameters:
        apt - Appointment which we want to add
        Returns:
        true if successfully add appointment in array list, false otherwise

      • deleteAppointment

        public boolean deleteAppointment(java.util.Calendar cal)
        Method used to delete appointment from array list
        Parameters:
        cal - Calendar object on which basis we want to remove appointment
        Returns:
        true if appointment successfully delete, false otherwise

      • changeAppointment

        public boolean changeAppointment(java.util.Calendar cal)
        Change appointment(if slot is free) after taking new time and date input from user
        Parameters:
        cal - Calendar object whose appointment we want to change
        Returns:
        true if appointment time successfully changes, false otherwise

      • displayAppointment

        public boolean displayAppointment(java.util.Calendar cal)
        Display appointment based on calendar object
        Parameters:
        cal - Calendar object contains date and time of appointment to be displayed
        Returns:
        true if appointment found and displayed, false otherwise

      • getAppointment

        public java.lang.String getAppointment(java.util.Calendar cal)
        Return Appointment based on calendar object
        Parameters:
        cal - Calendar object contains date and time of appointment to be get
        Returns:
        String based on Appointment find or not

      • displayDaySchedule

        public void displayDaySchedule(java.util.Calendar cal)
        Display all appointments from 8 o'clock to 17 o'clock of specific date
        Parameters:
        cal - Calendar object contains date to which appointments we want to display

      • saveAppointmentsToFile

        public static boolean saveAppointmentsToFile(java.util.ArrayList<Appointment> apts,
                                             java.lang.String saveFile)
        Save all appointments into file
        Parameters:
        apts - Array list of appointments
        saveFile - file name in which appointments are to be saved
        Returns:
        true if successfully saved appointments, false otherwise

      • loadAppointmentsFromFile

        public boolean loadAppointmentsFromFile(java.lang.String sourceFile,
                                        java.util.ArrayList<Appointment> apts)
        Load appointments from file and store it in array list
        Parameters:
        sourceFile - Name of file contains appointments
        apts - Appointments array list in which all appointments are loaded from file
        Returns:
        true if successfully load appointments from file, false otherwise
